value.string:
<tal:block metal:define-macro="header_definitions">
 <tal:block tal:define="
 global portal_path here/portal_url/getPortalPath;
 cancel_url request/cancel_url | request/ACTUAL_URL;
 local_parameter_list local_parameter_list | python: {};
 dummy python: local_parameter_list.update({'cancel_url': cancel_url});
 
 global actions python: here.getPortalObject().portal_actions.listFilteredActionsFor(here);
 global url python: '%s%s' % (request['SERVER_URL'], here.getPath(), );
 global current_form_id python: local_parameter_list.get('dialog_id', local_parameter_list.get('form_id', 'view'));
 global current_url python: '%s/%s' % (url, current_form_id);
 global current_action python: here.ERP5XhtmlStyle_getCurrentAction(current_url, actions);
 
 dummy python: request.RESPONSE.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/html;; charset=utf-8');
 dummy python: request.set('here', here);
 
 global css_list css_list | python: [];
 dummy python: css_list.append('%s/erp5.css' % (portal_path, ));
 global js_list js_list | python: [];
 dummy python: js_list.append('%s/erp5.js' % (portal_path, ));
 
 global http_parameter_list python: here.ERP5XhtmlStyle_filterParameterList(request.form);
 dummy python: http_parameter_list.update(local_parameter_list);
 global http_parameters python: here.ERP5XhtmlStyle_renderHTTPParameterList(http_parameter_list);
 global form nocall:form | nothing;
 portal_preferences python: here.getPortalObject().portal_preferences;
 global preferred_html_style_developper_mode portal_preferences/getPreferredHtmlStyleDevelopperMode;
 global preferred_html_style_translator_mode portal_preferences/getPreferredHtmlStyleTranslatorMode;
 global preferred_html_style_contextual_help portal_preferences/getPreferredHtmlStyleContextualHelp;
 global developper_shortcut_render python: (preferred_html_style_developper_mode or preferred_html_style_translator_mode) and here.developper_shortcut_render;
 global selected_language here/Localizer/get_selected_language;
 "/>
 </tal:block>
 
 <!-- ============================================================== -->
 
 <tal:block metal:define-macro="http_definitions">
 <tal:block tal:repeat="parameter http_parameter_list/items">
 <!-- Generic way of specifying http parameters -->
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: same_type(parameter[1], [])">
 <tal:block tal:repeat="list_item python: parameter[1]">
 <input type="hidden"
 tal:condition="python: list_item is not None"
 tal:attributes="name python: '%s:list' % (parameter[0], );
 value python: list_item;"/>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 <input type="hidden"
 tal:condition="python: not same_type(parameter[1], []) and parameter[1] is not None"
 tal:attributes="name python: parameter[0];
 value python: parameter[1];"/>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 
 <!-- ============================================================== -->
 
 <tal:block metal:define-macro="planning_box_definitions">
 <tal:block tal:condition="form/pt | nothing">
 <tal:block tal:define="planning_box python: here.ERP5XhtmlStyle_getPlanningBox(form)">
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: planning_box">
 <!-- PlanningBox generic stuff -->
 <style tal:content="structure python: planning_box.render_css(None,REQUEST=request)"
 tal:attributes="type python:'text/css'">
 </style>
 <tal:block tal:condition="python: planning_box.get_value('js_enabled')">
 <tal:block tal:define="dummy python:js_list.append('%s/wz_dragdrop.js' % (here.portal_url.getPortalPath(), ));" />
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
 </tal:block>
